summary: Project includes a mascot image/design that should be based on a provided picture, with a subtle hint of red added to the design.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Hand-drawn sketch mascot derived from the uploaded portrait, with a subtle red accent and transparent background (timepass-mascot-logo-upload-redhint.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Generate a new mascot/logo image derived from the uploaded image (Untitled_Artwork.jpeg) with a subtle hint of red while preserving the sketch/hand-drawn style, and export it as a square transparent PNG static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated.
Update all mascot/logo usages to use the newly generated mascot asset (HeroSection, TopNav, FooterSection) while keeping existing English alt text consistent with the brand name.

new_feature_requests.summary: Use the provided picture as the app mascot and add a subtle hint of red to the mascot design.

projectName: Use uploaded drawing as mascot and add subtle red accent
